  • Adding more info about needed software (pandoc and gpp) David Loureiro

  • Some more info about the input and output files. David Loureiro

  • Adding support of grid tables. David Loureiro

  • Adding preliminary support for graph and tables. graph support is based on pygal and table support is based on the reading of csv arrays. David Loureiro

  • Better management of pdf output files. David Loureiro
